statements: UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET email_address='newemail@example.com', behavior_track_1='clicked' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET behavior_track_2='subscribed', behavior_track_1='opened', email_address='user@example.com' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET email_address='john.doe@example.com', behavior_track_1='clicked', behavior_track_2='engaged' WHERE user_id=1
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET behavior_track_1='subscribed', email_address='jane.smith@example.com', behavior_track_2='purchased' WHERE user_id=2
UPDATE UserBehavior SET behavior_type = 'login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE EmailMarketingLists SET created_by = 'John Doe', creation_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE list_id = 456;
UPDATE UserBehavior SET behavior_type = 'Click', behavior_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE EmailMarketingLists SET list_name = 'Customers', created_by = 'Marketing Team', creation_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE list_id = 5678;
UPDATE user_behavior SET email='newemail@example.com', behavior_type='purchased' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE email_list SET segment_criteria='active_users' WHERE list_id=2;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'Clicked', behavior_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE email_list SET list_name = 'New Subscribers', segment_criteria = 'Active = Yes' WHERE list_id = 5
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'click', timestamp = '2022-09-30 10:15:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE email_subscriptions SET subscription_date = '2022-10-01', list_id = 3 WHERE subscription_id = 5;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type='logged_out' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE list_id=456 AND name='Winter Sale';
UPDATE user_demographics SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE email_activity SET activity_type='Click', activity_date='2022-01-15' WHERE email_id=456;
UPDATE user_demographics SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE email_activity SET activity_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE email_id = 456;
